p.s: The speech held by Michel Barnier at the European American Chamber of Commerce in New York at the 10th July 2018 is about the bad consequentesconsequences that Brexit will have.
He is the EU commissioner for withdrawal negotiation with the UK.
He pointed multiple consequences out that will lead to Brexit being a lose-lose situation (ll. 9-10) for Europe and Great Britain.
The first problem would be that supply chains are close between Europe.
That will lead to the need of adapting supply chains and contracts (cf. ll. 14).
His first suggestion is to have a good relation betwenbetween financial sectors in Europe and the United Kingdom (cf. ll. 15-18).
He saysays about the European Union that it will stay the same and stay open to other countries (cf. ll. 27-32).
As a charasteristicscharacteristics of a close releationshiprelationship betwenbetween UK and EU he namenames mainly two points.
The first being supply chains, being closely integrated across national Border (l. 7).
The second is the close relationship [...] in financial services (ll. 15-16).
Both leading to a close relationship.
